dot: digraph VoronoiDiagram{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightgrey];subgraph cluster_voronoi{label="Voronoi Diagram";style=dashed;Voronoi[label="Voronoi Diagram: Partitioning a plane into regions"];Sites[label="Sites: Points on the plane"];Cells[label="Cells: Areas closer to a site than any other site"];VoronoiVertices[label="Voronoi Vertices: Equidistant from three sites"]; Voronoi->Sites;Voronoi->Cells;Voronoi->VoronoiVertices;}subgraph cluster_fortune{label="Fortune's Algorithm";style=dashed;Fortune[label="Fortune's Algorithm: O(nlogn) complexity"];SweepLine[label="Sweep Line: Sweeps across the plane"];Events[label="Events: Site and Circle events"];BeachLine[label="Beach Line: Frontier of active arcs"];Parabolas[label="Parabolas: Define arcs"]; Fortune->SweepLine;Fortune->Events;Fortune->BeachLine;Fortune->Parabolas;}subgraph cluster_process{label="Processing Events";style=dashed;SiteEvent[label="Site Event: Adds new arc"];CircleEvent[label="Circle Event: Removes arc, creates Voronoi Vertex"];Intersection[label="Intersection: Between arcs"]; Events->SiteEvent;Events->CircleEvent;BeachLine->Intersection;}subgraph cluster_edges{label="Edges and Vertices";style=dashed;IncompleteEdge[label="Incomplete Edge: Unfixed point"];HalfEdge[label="Half Edge: Part of DCEL"];VoronoiVertex[label="Voronoi Vertex: Equidistant point"]; IncompleteEdge->HalfEdge;CircleEvent->VoronoiVertex;VoronoiVertex->HalfEdge;}Voronoi->Fortune;Fortune->Processing;Processing->EdgesAndVertices;label="Generating Voronoi Diagrams using Fortune's Algorithm";}
